title-group.article-title: EXPLICIT ESTIMATES ON SEVERAL SUMMATORY FUNCTIONS INVOLVING THE MOEBIUS FUNCTION

abstract.p: We prove that $|{\mathrm{\Sigma }}_{\mathrm{d}\le \mathrm{x}}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{\mu }(\mathrm{d})/\mathrm{d}|\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{log}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{x}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\le \text{\hspace{0.17em}}1/69$ when x ≥ 96 955 and deduce from that $\left|{\mathrm{\Sigma }}_{{\{}_{(\mathrm{d},\mathrm{q})=1}^{\mathrm{d}\le \mathrm{x},}}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{\mu }\left(\mathrm{d}\right)/\mathrm{d}\right|\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{log}(\mathrm{x}/\mathrm{q})\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\le \text{\hspace{0.17em}}\frac{4}{5}\mathrm{q}/\mathrm{\varphi }\left(\mathrm{q}\right)$ for every x > q ≥ 1. We also give better constants when x/q is larger. Furthermore we prove that $|1\text{\hspace{0.17em}}-\text{\hspace{0.17em}}{\mathrm{\Sigma }}_{\mathrm{d}\le \mathrm{x}}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{\mu }\left(\mathrm{d}\right)\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{log}(\mathrm{x}/\mathrm{d})/\mathrm{d}|\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\le \text{\hspace{0.17em}}\frac{3}{14}/\mathrm{log}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{x}$ and several similar bounds, from which we also prove corresponding bounds when summing the same quantity, but with the additional condition (d, q) = 1. We prove similar results for ${\mathrm{\Sigma }}_{\mathrm{d}\le \mathrm{x}}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{\mu }\left(\mathrm{d}\right)\text{\hspace{0.17em}}{\mathrm{log}}^{2}(\mathrm{x}/\mathrm{d})/\mathrm{d}$, among which we mention the bound $|{\mathrm{\Sigma }}_{\mathrm{d}\le \mathrm{x}}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{\mu }\left(\mathrm{d}\right)\text{\hspace{0.17em}}{\mathrm{log}}^{2}(\mathrm{x}/\mathrm{d})/\mathrm{d}-\text{\hspace{0.17em}}2\mathrm{log}\mathrm{x}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}+\text{\hspace{0.17em}}{2}_{\mathrm{\gamma }0}|\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\le \text{\hspace{0.17em}}\frac{2}{24}/\mathrm{log}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{x}$, where γ₀ is the Euler constant. We complete this collection by bounds such as $|{\mathrm{\Sigma }}_{{\{}_{(\mathrm{d},\mathrm{q})=1}^{\mathrm{d}\le \mathrm{x},}}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\mathrm{\mu }\left(\mathrm{d}\right)|/\mathrm{x}\text{\hspace{0.17em}}\le \text{\hspace{0.17em}}\frac{\mathrm{q}}{\mathrm{\varphi }\left(\mathrm{q}\right)}/\mathrm{log}(\mathrm{x}/\mathrm{q})$ We also provide all these bounds with variations where 1/log x is replaced by 1/(1 + log x).
